alert.note: Alert for Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 27 at 4:05AM PST until December 27 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST THIS MORNING... * CHANGES...Updated transition time between High Wind Warning and Winter Weather Advisory to 7am. * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * WHERE...Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will begin to impact the higher elevations this morning, especially above 7000 feet. Snow levels will drop through the day as the Winter Winter Weather Advisory goes into effect.
info.instruction: If possible, avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches as they may be prone to fall. Remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
